short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download fashion show pictures from websites like Vogue Runway and Tagwalk, in just one click and in several formats!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In a single click, the Runway Downloader extension allows you to:

1. Generate clean-looking 3 x 3 PDF numbered runway boards.
2. Download all the photos of a show, at once, in single JPG files.
3. Generate and download small numbered look cards, perfect for PR requests during shoot prep.

As a former stylist assistant, I understand the struggle of manually downloading thousands of runway looks to create hundreds of runway boards for shoot prep, not to mention numbering the looks, numbering the pages, maintaining a clean consistent layout... It's pure hell üî•. That's why I created this extension!

But that's not all:

‚≠êÔ∏è ‚Äì FEATURES ‚Äì ‚≠êÔ∏è

‚Ä¢ PDF Board: No more wasting time on manual single image downloads. With just one click, RunwayDownloader effortlessly compiles your selected images into a clean numbered PDF board.
‚Ä¢ Individual Images: Each runway look downloaded instantly to your computer.
‚Ä¢ Small Numbered Cards: Small images, perfect for sending out PR requests.
‚Ä¢ File Organisation: All files organised into a single .zip folder with each asset filed in its own directory.
‚Ä¢ One-time Settings: Set your settings once, then just click the "Download" button.
‚Ä¢ Lightweight Files: RunwayDownloader strives to deliver lightweight files for easy storage and sharing (email, SMS, or any preferred channel).
‚Ä¢ Original Page Access: Easily obtain more information by clicking on the photo credit located at the bottom of each page of the PDF, which leads you directly to the source website.
‚Ä¢ Page Numbering: Each page is clearly numbered, so you'll always know if you're missing one (I know it's happened to me).

‚≠êÔ∏è ‚Äì HOW TO USE ‚Äì ‚≠êÔ∏è

‚Ä¢ Navigate to the collection's page and locate the "DOWNLOAD ‚ô•Ô∏è" button (bottom left on Vogue Runway, top left on TagWalk).
‚Ä¢ Click "Settings" to choose which asset(s) you need (default: all assets will be downloaded).
‚Ä¢ Click the "Download ‚ô•Ô∏è" button and wait for the assets to be generated.
‚Ä¢ Download will start automatically once the file is ready, either as a single PDF or a clean and convenient .zip file.
‚Ä¢ That's it!

‚≠êÔ∏è ‚Äì COMPATIBLE WEBSITES ‚Äì ‚≠êÔ∏è

‚Ä¢ Vogue Runway (Digital Access subscription now necessary)
‚Ä¢ TagWalk (Free account)

‚≠êÔ∏è ‚Äì PRIVACY & SECURITY ‚Äì ‚≠êÔ∏è

‚Ä¢ We value your privacy; our extension doesn't collect any personal information from you.
‚Ä¢ We record the following anonymous data to better understand usage of our extension: clicks on download button, clicks on settings button.
‚Ä¢ No identifying information is collected, no information is sold to third parties.
‚Ä¢ RunwayDownloader does not store cookies, ensuring a worry-free experience.

‚≠êÔ∏è ‚Äì SUPPORT ‚Äì ‚≠êÔ∏è

Need assistance, have questions, or want to see a feature implemented? Our dedicated support team (that's me) is here to help. Reach out, and I'll promptly assist you.
